lead_paragraph: Alabama cornerback Simeon Castille was arrested early yesterday on a disorderly conduct charge.A Tuscaloosa, Ala., police spokesman, Capt. Greg Kosloff, said Castille was arrested in an entertainment district near campus. The police declined to release details of the incident.Castille was one of the top defensive backs in the Southeastern Conference last season. He is the fourth Alabama player to be arrested in the last two months.
